name: Hero Of Valley
description:
IF YOU DECIDE TO USE HTML VERSION PLEASE CLICK FULL SCREEN FROM THE VIEWER THEN PRESS FULL SCREEN AGAIN FROM UNITY PAGE.

Controls :
- A : Move Left ( you can use Arrow too )
- D : Move Right ( you can use Arrow too )
- Space : for jump
- Mouse : for rotate world when you click on arrow buttons side screen


Hero Of Valley is an indie puzzle-platform video game developed by RedShark game studio. This game inspire from fez and Monument Valley , The player able to control world that reveals his two-dimensional (2D) world to be one of four sides of a three-dimensional (3D) world. The player rotates between these four 2D views to realign platforms and solve the game's puzzles. The object of the game is to collect stars and key to open the door and go next level.
